alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Lake; Newton; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 10:07PM EDT until March 31 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Newton County in northwestern Indiana... Southern Porter County in northwestern Indiana... Southeastern Lake County in northwestern Indiana... Jasper County in northwestern Indiana... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 907 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Hebron to near Lake Village to near Martinton, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rensselaer, DeMotte, Hebron, Wheatfield, Roselawn, Kouts, Hanging Grove, Collegeville, Mount Ayr, Thayer, Baileys Corner, Stoutsburg, Fair Oaks, Parr and Dunns Bridge. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 213 and 235. This includes... US 41 Dragway. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Illinois...and northwestern Indiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for northeastern and east central Illinois...and northwestern Indiana.
